DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy single treatment PRX302 treatment Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study PRX302 Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Due Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH )
DOC.criteria: Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) attributable BPH ≥6 month Written inform consent prior enrollment study IPSS ≥12 Prostate volume 30 100 mL determine TRUS Maximum urine flow ( Qmax ) 4 15 mL/sec Refractory , intolerant refuse use alphablockers and/or 5 alphareductase inhibitor Unwilling unable undergo conventional surgical available minimally invasive treatment Blood PSA value < 10 ng/mL Inability void least 125 mL urine PVR volume > 200 mL Presence history certain condition could interfere study result endanger subject Use certain prescribed medication could interfere study result
